test_input: Create a social media banner for our summer sale. Brand name: "SunFlow". Use bright yellow, orange, and teal colors. Modern minimalist style. For Instagram (1200x628px). Message: "Summer Sale - 50% Off - Shop Now". Include our logo placeholder areas and make it visually striking with geometric shapes.

response.raw_text:
Your modern, minimalist Instagram banner for SunFlow's Summer Sale has been created!

Design Details:
- Dimensions: 1200x628px (optimized for Instagram)
- Colors: Bright yellow, orange, teal, and white
- Style: Modern, minimalist, with bold geometric shapes (circles, rectangles, triangles)
- Text: "Summer Sale - 50% Off - Shop Now" in a clean, bold sans-serif font
- Logo placeholders: Top left and bottom right
- Visual: No photos, only striking vector-style elements

You can view and download your banner here:
[SunFlow Summer Sale Instagram Banner](https://url-shortner.studio.lyzr.ai/e1fb695e)

Let me know if you need any revisions, text changes, or a different layout!

test_behavior: Agent successfully generated design specifications and provided download URL for artifact file
notes: Agent requires detailed design specifications to generate artifacts. When provided with comprehensive requirements (brand name, colors, dimensions, style, text, and layout details), the agent creates a design with accompanying URL for the generated image. The response includes the design rationale and parameters used, plus a link to view/download the banner.
